thread.title: Trump’s Plan to Lower Drug Prices: A Q&A

author: Stephanie Armour
title: Trump’s Plan to Lower Drug Prices: A Q&A
text:
President Donald Trump Friday unveiled a new proposal to help lower drug prices. Here are some basic questions and answers:
Why is he tackling drug prices now?
Mr. Trump promised while campaigning to attack high prescription-drug prices and he now faces mounting criticism from Democrats for not doing enough. Polls show health-care costs are... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
